member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.Report
member.summary: Gets or sets a report object which is shown in the viewer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.PreviewDataSet
member.summary: Internal use only.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.ViewerSplashScreenSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a path to the splash screen xap file.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.ViewerSplashScreenProgressChangedMethodName
member.summary: Gets or sets a name of the splash screen progress changed method.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.ThemeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the current visual theme which is used for drawing visual elements of the viewer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.AutoMaximize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates that the viewer must have maximal possible size in the browser.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.ViewerSource
member.summary: Gets or sets a path to the ViewerSL.xap file.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.CacheMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the mode of the report caching.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.ServerTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a value which indicates how much time do the report rendering result will be stored in the server cache.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.ReportGuid
member.summary: Internal use only.

member.summary: Gets or sets a zoom mode of the viewer.

member.summary: Gets or sets a mode of the page loading in the viewer.

member.name: P:Stimulsoft.Report.WebSL.StiWebViewerSL.Zoom
member.summary: Gets or sets the report showing zoom. The default value is 100.
